title: 'No after sales service . Zero response.'
body: The radio performed well at beginning. But gradually it's volume knob is causing noise. Though the company was informed the same, no response received in return. There is no information as to who will fix the problem. Hence, I advice not to buy this radio.

body: '4.0 out of 5 stars''The speaker is very good and clear has a long antenna so no shhhh sounds comes with big blue colour battery inside comes with a charger cable and an adapter. It was better if the channel changing thing had a button rather than this old retro style round changing thing.'

title: 'Best gift for my father'
body: The media could not be loaded. One of the best choices i made. This was a gift to my dad. Chose pagaria after an extensive research. Saw many negative reviews but i dont find anything wrong with the radio.. It has fm/am/sw bands with usb, memory card and Bluetooth option. Actually Bluetooth was added to this recently i guess there is no dedicated button to turn Bluetooth on, instead we just need to push a bit up from the USB option. Speakers are very loud and clear even at the maximum volume without any distortion. AM band is same as MW so don't get confused. If you have enough signal range in your place, then go for it without a second thought. Look wise and quality wise, i would rate 5 stars. All functions are working perfectly.

title: 'Great radio'
body: 'Best radio so far in terms of reception and sound quality. It‚Äôs been only one day though cannot say if in future this radio will turn out to be d same. Price is high! The same can be sold at N economical and lower price since ‚Äúa radio is only a radio‚Äù not a stereo system!!!'

title: 'Very light in weight and weak'
body: Products has few good operational options but product is very weak and light and seems very cheap. After paying 1600+ you can't say it good. Similar can easily get in local market and local brand.. Connectivity is also not good of channel. Go for Phillips kind of brand.. It's not worth for money.. Seller has few good reviews but i guess those paid one..
